{"id":698660507,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1652441717,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/698660507/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n        map<char,int>m;\n        m.insert({'I',1});\n        m.insert({'V',5});\n        m.insert({'X',10});\n        m.insert({'L',50});\n        m.insert({'C',100});\n        m.insert({'D',500});\n        m.insert({'M',1000});\n        \n        int c=0,l=s.size(),i=0;\n        while(i<l){\n            if(s[i]=='I' && s[i+1]=='V'){\n                c=c+m['V']-m['I'];\n                i=i+2;\n            }\n            else if(s[i]=='I' && s[i+1]=='X'){\n                c=c+m['X']-m['I'];\n                i=i+2;\n            }\n            else if(s[i]=='X' && s[i+1]=='L'){\n                c=c+m['L']-m['X'];\n                i=i+2;\n            }\n            else if(s[i]=='X' && s[i+1]=='C'){\n                c=c+m['C']-m['X'];\n                i=i+2;\n            }\n            else if(s[i]=='C' && s[i+1]=='D'){\n                c=c+m['D']-m['C'];\n                i=i+2;\n            }\n            else if(s[i]=='C' && s[i+1]=='M'){\n                c=c+m['M']-m['C'];\n                i=i+2;\n            }\n            else{\n                c=c+m[s[i]];\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n        return c;\n    }\n    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer","has_notes":false}
